sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./about.css"; const About = () => (

Get to know me



I'm a mom, yoga teacher, runner, and avid video game player. I love spending time with my husband and kids, walking our tiny dog Chu. I enjoy sunshine and laughing. I take my work, not myself, seriously. I have experience managing classrooms, working independently, and being busy since I worked as an English professor for nine years. Mountains of papers don't grade themselves, and no two students are the same. I'm adept at overcoming challenges, personally and professionally.

I find coding very meditative, and I love creating. I'll always choose a relational database over a non-relational one, but I won't hold it against you if you disagree with me. I'm a front-end kind of gal with plenty of experience on the back-end, too. I just think the front-end is more fun.

); export default About;
